function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i<5' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i<5' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'j<i' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'j<i' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<5' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<i' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'i (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'j (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'j' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Is the statement 'x += i + j - 1;' unreachable?
Can the program actually reach the statement: “for(j=0; j<i; j++) {”?
